title: New: Seoul – Haunt / A Light
content:
Seoul’s debut LP, I Become A Shade, is one of my most anticipated releases of 2015.

Adopting the minimal approach, in terms of releases and surrounding information, the Canadian outfit keep their intimate music as the central focus. New track, Haunt / A Light, is vaguely reminiscent of Rhye’s debut; intricately composed and ravishingly beautiful. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
